quality_assessment: Page is well-structured with accurate source references and working code examples. Minor updates needed for source line references and visual enhancements could be added.

issues.description: Source reference mentions line 40 but the actual working_dir field definition is on line 40 of src/commands/handlers/shell.rs. Reference is accurate but could include additional context about the function.
issues.fix_suggestion: Add function context to source reference for clearer navigation.

issues.description: The code annotation syntax used (numbered comments like `# (1)!`) is a MkDocs Material feature that requires the pymdownx.superfences and pymdownx.inlinehilite extensions. The annotations are placed correctly but users may not see them rendered if extensions aren't enabled.
issues.should_be: Verify mkdocs.yml has pymdownx.superfences and annotation support configured
issues.fix_suggestion: Ensure mkdocs.yml configuration supports code annotations or convert to standard inline comments.

issues.description: The circuit breaker documentation is accurate but could benefit from a practical troubleshooting section explaining how to debug circuit breaker issues in production.
issues.fix_suggestion: Add a brief troubleshooting tip about monitoring circuit breaker state transitions.

positive_aspects: Accurate source references with line numbers for all major features
Excellent Mermaid state diagram for circuit breaker visualization
Comprehensive backoff strategy examples with tabbed content
Clear comparison table for backoff strategies
Proper cross-references to related documentation pages
Well-structured examples progressing from basic to advanced
Git context variables documented with multiple format and filter options
Working directory usage is fully explained with variable interpolation support
improvement_suggestions: Add admonition boxes (info, tip, warning) for key callouts using MkDocs Material syntax
Consider adding a code group for the circuit breaker YAML example showing different threshold configurations
The retry_on error types could benefit from a brief description of each matcher type
Add a visual diagram showing retry timing with different backoff strategies

metadata.validation_focus: Auto-discovered page - check for drift and enhance with visual features
